```{r}
#| message: false

library(DT)
df <- read.table('./institutes.csv',header = T,sep = ',')
df$Name <- paste0("<a href='", df$URL, "'>",df$Name,"</a>")
df$URL <- NULL
DT::datatable(
  df, escape = FALSE, options = list(
    searching = FALSE, paging = FALSE, info = FALSE
  )
)
```
